clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Tolnaftate topical is used to treat skin infections such as athlete s foot jock itch and ringworm infections Tolnaftate is also used along with other antifungals to treat infections of the nails scalp palms and soles of the feet The powder and powder aerosol may be used to prevent athlete s foot

contraindications.disease: Oral rat LD50 891 mg kg Inhalation rat LC50 900 mg m3 1hr Irritation skin rabbit 500 mg 24H mild Eye rabbit 100 mg severe Investigated a mutagen and reproductive effector
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Tolnaftate is a synthetic over the counter anti fungal agent
